name: Get Your Head Around These! 5 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
A cat has one, a horse two - some animals have more 

An elephant has only three - while a crocodile has four.

What are they?
questions.explanation:
vowels & a vowel & vowel.

	The numbers relate to the number of vowels in the animal's name.

questions.text:
Coats are usually put on to keep warm and dry... and yet! 

What type of coat must you always put on only when wet?

Hikers are out of order

Re-arrange them... that's right 

Now hear them make a shrill cry

Expressing fright, shock or delight!
questions.explanation:
shriek.

	Shriek is an anagram of hikers.

questions.text:
A token of ones love - a constant bend

Have no beginning ... I also have no end.

I am a _ _ _ _?

Study this list of letters-

J F M A M J -? A S O N D 

Which of the letters below fills the gap?
questions.explanation:
J.

	They are the initial letters of the twelve calendar months-J-anuary, F-ebruary, M-arch... J-uly is missing.

questions.text:
A precipitation of weather come your way 

The solution add a 'd' and it will run away.

(Read the hint)
questions.explanation:
drain&rain.

	A precipitation of weather is rain. Add a 'd' for the solution 'd+rain'.

questions.text: Which of these "anagrams" is the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Dynamo.

	Dynamo is an anagram of Monday. The others are anagrams of months: Charm = MarchYam = MayPilar = April(Pilar means - covered with or relating to hair.)

questions.text:
Inflamed I'm angry, infuriated - and yet  

In flames aromatic, sweet smelling smoke I emit.

What number is missing from this list?   

8 5 4 _? 1 7 6

Do I have to spell it out for you?
questions.explanation:
9.

	The numbers are arranged in alphabetical order when spelt as words.

questions.text:
I start going and end up doing  

finish everything, and conclude nothing.
questions.correct: g & a g & letter g & the letter g
questions.explanation: g & a g & letter g & the letter g.
